name: Vintage Visual Style
description: Classic film aesthetic with aged colors, film grain, and nostalgic atmosphere

prompt.base: Vintage film aesthetic, aged colors, film grain, nostalgic atmosphere, classic photography, faded tones, retro style, old film look, sepia undertones, vintage cinematography, timeless quality
prompt.positive: vintage photography, film grain, aged colors, nostalgic mood, classic film aesthetic, faded tones, retro style, old photograph, sepia tones, vintage texture, timeless beauty, classic cinematography, soft focus, warm tones
prompt.negative: modern digital, sharp clarity, vibrant colors, contemporary style, high definition, clean image, digital perfection, current trends

technical.rendering: Aged film simulation with grain and color shift
technical.textures: Vintage texture overlays, film grain, subtle damage
technical.lighting: Soft vintage lighting with warm tones

variations.name: 1920s Vintage
variations.modifier: silent film aesthetic, high contrast, sepia tone, art deco influence, early cinema

variations.name: 1950s Vintage
variations.modifier: Technicolor aesthetic, saturated colors, golden age Hollywood, classic glamour

variations.name: 1970s Vintage
variations.modifier: warm color cast, soft focus, earthy tones, retro fashion, nostalgic atmosphere

examples: A portrait with vintage film grain, faded colors, nostalgic atmosphere, classic photography aesthetic
A street scene with sepia tones, aged film look, vintage texture, timeless quality
